section.title: OS X Installation
section.p:
To install on OS X, follow these steps:
Download the OS X installation package ().
[Optional] Validate the integrity of the downloaded file by checking it against the MD5 sum published on the download page.
Double-click the disk image file to mount it.
Drag/Copy the folder to your /Applications folder (or another location if you wish).If you receive a warning that an installation folder already exists in the Applications folder, do not attempt to merge the two installations. Instead, select Replace or move the old installation folder to the trash bin before installing the application.Do not copy the files/folders from within the folder (always copy the folder itself), otherwise you will omit invisible files/folders and the application may no longer start.
Start , using one of the following methods:
Double-click Oxygen XML Editor.appOxygen XML Author.appOxygen XML Developer.appSyncro SVN Client.app.
Run sh oxygen.shsh oxygenAuthor.shsh oxygenDeveloper.shsh syncroSVNClient.sh in the command-line interface.
To license your copy of , go to Help Register to enter your license key.

section.title: OS X Unattended Installation
section.p:
To install on OS X in unattended mode, follow these steps:
Download the OS X installation package ().
Mount the file in the command line.hdiutil attach oxygen.dmg|oxygenAuthor.dmg|oxygenDeveloper.dmg
Copy the oxygen folder for the particular version from the mounted volume to the Applications folder (or another folder where you want to install it), as in the following example:cp -aR "/Volumes/Oxygen XML Editor 21.0/Oxygen XML Editor" /Applications/|cp -aR "/Volumes/Oxygen XML Author 21.0/Oxygen XML Author" /Applications/|cp -aR "/Volumes/Oxygen XML Developer 21.0/Oxygen XML Developer" /Applications/|
Eject the mounted disc image:hdiutil detach "/Volumes/Oxygen XML Editor 21.0"|hdiutil detach "/Volumes/Oxygen XML Author 21.0"|hdiutil detach "/Volumes/Oxygen XML Developer 21.0"|
